summary: Provides a graphical interface that embeds a plotting canvas to render linear representations of flight track data, manages connections to the underlying data model, and offers user actions for accessing tools, adjusting settings, and refreshing map visualizations. Includes a configuration dialog for collecting and storing view parameters.
business_intent: Enable users to interactively explore and analyze atmospheric measurement data collected along flight paths by visualizing them in a linear format, customizing display options, and keeping the view synchronized with map data within the MSS application.
